H0.text: Who wrote the collection of Gothic horror stories entitled In A Glass Darkly in 1872. Edgar Allan Poe

H1.text: Who wrote the collection of Gothic horror stories entitled In A Glass Darkly in 1872. Bram Stoker

H2.text: Who wrote the collection of Gothic horror stories entitled In A Glass Darkly in 1872. Mary Shelley

H3.text: Who wrote the collection of Gothic horror stories entitled In A Glass Darkly in 1872. Le Fanu

A4.text: In a Glass Darkly is a collection of five stories by the Irish author Sheridan Le Fanu, first published in 1872
